definition: erhua variant of 一股腦|一股脑[yi1 gu3 nao3]
variant of 一股腦兒|一股脑儿[yi1 gu3 nao3 r5]
erhua variant of 探頭探腦|探头探脑[tan4 tou2 tan4 nao3]

sentences.english: The absence of the fetal cranial vault in anencephaly is shown here.
sentences.chinese: 無腦兒顯示胎兒顱穹窿缺陷。

sentences.english: You dig up the past, all you get is dirty.
sentences.chinese: 你把過去一股腦兒都挖了出來，那可都是見不得人的。

sentences.english: Anencephaly is absence of the fetal cranial vault.
sentences.chinese: 無腦兒是胎兒顱穹窿缺陷。

sentences.english: The bottom of the bucket is clean knocked cut.
sentences.chinese: 水桶底兒一古腦兒地都磕掉了。

sentences.english: He and I went to the train and put the oranges peremptorily on my fur coat .
sentences.chinese: 他和我走到車上，將桔子一股腦兒放在我的皮大衣上。

sentences.english: He loves having jellied bean curd in the morning for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 他早晨喜歡喫一碗豆腐腦兒。

sentences.english: I was In hIgh spIrIts. The fear and dIscomfort In whIch I had been lIvIng vanIshed entIrely.
sentences.chinese: 我非常興奮，剛纔的恐懼和不適一古腦兒都消失了。

sentences.english: He would have preferred to put her idea aside together, if he had known how.
sentences.chinese: 如果他已經知道情況，他寧願把她一古腦兒拋到一邊。

sentences.english: She got so excited that she poured out all she had to say at once.
sentences.chinese: 她興奮得很，把要講的話一股腦兒都倒出來了。

sentences.english: Existing economic system was taken over holus-bolus.
sentences.chinese: 現存的經濟制度被一古腦兒全盤接收了過來。
